---
title: "Reflections"
---

These are our reflections on how it has been working together in a more
open and collaborative way, as well as any challenges and lessons
learned along the way. We were not systematic about when we added these
notes, we mostly did it when we co-worked together and/or when we felt
like adding a reflection.

Hannah was originally involved in this project but left academia and
could not continue being involved.
